channel.title: Testscape? Won't let me make some 1 admin -.-
channel.description: alright so I switched sources, and now, when I got to edit some1s account (their logged out) I edit their player rights to 2, then I save, then they log in, and no adm in! any1 care to help plz?

item.title: Testscape? Won't let me make some 1 admin -.-
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:

justlikers:

Testscape sucks…get pimp or phone

Thats funny pimp and phone are testscape based, and that wasnt his question

item.title: Testscape? Won't let me make some 1 admin -.-
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Actually there is a way... First when you compile there cant be any errors. Second search in the client for:

adminkeep searching until you see names. Replace the name with the person you want to be an admin. Do the same for a mod.

~And btw i don’t recommend testscape…I only recommend it if you are a new coder and have absoulutley no knowledge of java or very little.

Recommendations
1.Pimpscape/Jorsa scape—>Prefer to use this one if you can
2.Svenscap3
3.Fr33sc4p3

~Pk4pk

Read full topic
